thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Impressed
thread.title_full: Impressed - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MrMarkBennettcom
title: Impressed
text: Myself and a few friends enjoyed a 5 night stay at the Renwick utilising the adjoining welcoming Bedford bar on a couple of occasions. The rooms were spacious, modern, fresh and clean with a huge TV and mini fridge. The large bed was comfortable and ensuite well equipped with a large walk in shower. The hotel has only missed out on getting a 5th star as I had to ask 3 times over 2 days for a kettle.I personally think a kettle should be a basic inclusion in any hotel room and although they have coffee in the lobby during the morning who wants to get out of bed and trapes down bleary eyed for a hot drink? Not me. All that said the staff were all very friendly and helpful, the locations great and I'd recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in midtown.
